The claim originated from a blog post on: com, which stated that the Dalai Lama made the statement in Zurich when he met 6500 Tibetans in Switzerland.
The Dalai Lama: s response to a question about American elections in general and Donald Trump specifically during an interview on Good Morning Britain did not include any mention of Trump being worse than Hitler or a threat to humanity.
News accounts of the Dalai Lama: s trip to Switzerland mentioned his interactions with the Tibetan community, his participation in a tenshuk long-life ceremony, and his encouragement for young Swiss Tibetans to preserve Tibetan identity.
